revised_title: Non-Linear Ordinary Differential Equations in Laminar Boundary-Layer
tldr: The authors present a method for solving non-linear ordinary differential equations related to laminar boundary-layer problems. They discuss the integration of these equations, focusing on the Falkner-Skan equation and its applications in hydrodynamics. The paper also provides a detailed analysis of the behavior of the equations at infinity and the integration process, which is divided into three separate steps.
